key_trends: Growing awareness of digital asset inheritance
Demand for secure and decentralized estate planning solutions

competitive_positioning.competitive_moat: Smart contract technology and early mover advantage in a niche market.
competitive_positioning.differentiation: On-chain dead man's switch for automated crypto asset transfer.
competitive_advantages: First-mover advantage in a specialized niche
competitive_vulnerabilities: Reliance on blockchain security and smart contract integrity
Regulatory uncertainty surrounding crypto assets and inheritance

growth_indicators: User adoption rate of crypto inheritance solutions
Partnerships with crypto wallets and exchanges
growth_bottlenecks: User education and trust in smart contract solutions

strengths: Addresses a growing need in the crypto space
Leverages blockchain technology for secure asset transfer
Potential for high margins with a SaaS model
concerns: Inactive status raises questions about viability
Limited market traction and user adoption

next_steps: Re-evaluate market demand and competitive landscape
Focus on user education and building trust
Explore partnerships with established crypto platforms
expansion_opportunities: Offering estate planning services for other digital assets (NFTs, etc.)
